H0.text: who issued gold coins for the first time in india. Mauryan Empire

H1.text: who issued gold coins for the first time in india. Kushan Empire

H2.text: who issued gold coins for the first time in india. Indo-Greek Kingdom

H3.text: who issued gold coins for the first time in india. Gupta Empire

A4.text: He issued gold coins in addition to the existing copper and silver coinage.

A5.text: The coinage of the Gupta Empire was also initially derived from the coinage of the Kushan Empire, adopting its weight standard, techniques and designs.
